headline: With Colder Temperatures Approaching, PG&E Offering Free Gas Appliance Safety Checks and Pilot Re-Lights to Reduce Carbon Monoxide Risks
summary: To help customers prepare their gas appliances for safe use during the cold weather months ahead, Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) is offering free in-home gas safety checks. During the gas safety checks, PG&E also will re-light pilot lights for customers who have heaters or other appliances that have been turned off during warmer months.
